UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Stores user profile information for SnuggleShop.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was last updated.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. The document ID is the same as the Firebase Auth UID, granting the user ownership of their profile.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Auth UID of the user.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to store user profile information. It adheres to the principle of Authorization Independence by relying on path-based ownership for user profiles. The structure uses a dedicated collection `users` to store user profile data. This approach provides a clear and secure method for managing user data and access.  Since the application uses Firebase Authentication, the User ID from Authentication will be used as the document ID in the `/users/{userId}` collection, making path-based rules simple and efficient. This also eliminates the need for custom claims or complex role-based access control, ensuring security and separation of concerns.
